label.role.author: Author
text.login.title: Login
text.loginauth.title: Before we can sign you in, we need to verify you are the account owner. Choose to send an authentication code to your email or to your phone via SMS.
text.authcode.title: Enter the five digit code we sent to your registered {type}
label.usermgmt.title: User Management
text.usermgmt.deactivatemsg: This user will no longer be able to access the system until an Omnicia administrator enables their account again. Any remaining time from the assigned subscription license can be applied to another user within 30 days.
text.user.editmsg: Make edits to this {type} profile below
text.user.addmsg: Complete the form below to add a new {type}. Fields with an * are mandatory.
text.user.selectrolemsg: Select the role that this user will be assigned*
text.user.selectdeptmsg: Select the department this user is a part of*
text.user.choosesubscriptionmsg: Choose a subscription license to apply to this user's account.
text.user.addevennolicence: You can still add this user, but they won’t be able to login and access the platform until they’re assigned a subscription license. Contact an Omnicia Admin to purchase more licenses for your account.
label.user.name: Name
error.user.licenceassigned: {product} - This license was previously assigned to an account that is now deactivated. {remain} days of access remain. Expires in {expire} days if left unassigned.
text.customer.deactivate: The customer will no longer be able to access the system until an Omnicia administrator enables their account again.
text.customer.edit: Make edits to this customer profile below
text.customer.amtofdatastorage: Enter the amount of data storage this customer wants:
text.customer.noofapplications: Enter the number of applications this customer wants:
text.customer.applicationstolicence: Select which applications this customer wants to license (Select all that apply) :
text.customer.nooflicencetopurchase: Enter the # of {type} subscription licenses this customer wants to purchase (Select at least one):
